description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission reference 233596FUL dated 14/02/2024 for 'Phased redevelopment of the site to provide a part two (double height space), part three storey educational building for use as a 6 form entry secondary school with sixth form and additional resource provision (ARP) accommodation; extension to existing sport pitches; installation of three court multi-use games area (MUGA); modification of access points, including the provision of ARP drop off and pick up on Eastcote Lane (south); and associated car parking, landscaping, refuse storage, cycle parking and boundary treatment (following demolition of existing school buildings and other associated works) (Use Class F1) (Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing)'. Amendments include relocating the lift to the northwest corner of the stairwell and rearranging the staircase of the main building; stepping out of the stairwell fa√ßade at 740.5mm; relocating the stairwell door to the corridor on the first and second floors; relocating the external stairwell door on the ground floor; and relocating mechanical equipment associated with the lift on the roof
